plt.figure(figsize=(14,6))
plt.title("Variation  in Apparent Temparature and Humidity with time")
plt.plot(df_1)
source.41e86e55: We can clearly see that there is a sharp rise in temperature in the year of 2009 whereas there is a fall in temperature in the year of 2015. Hence we can conclude that global warming has caused an uncertainty in temperature over the past 10 years while the average humidity as remained constant throughout the 10 years.
